products.name: Pearl Milling Original Syrup imp
products.facts: ["Made with high fructose corn syrup and natural flavors.","The packaging is recyclable, promoting eco-friendliness.","Contains no artificial colors or preservatives, ensuring quality and safety.","Produced in a facility that adheres to strict quality control standards."]

products.name: Fine Ground Sea Salt Almond Flour Crackers
products.labels: No gluten, No GMOs, Certified gluten-free, Non GMO project
products.facts: ["Made with fine ground sea salt and almond flour, providing a gluten-free alternative.","Crafted from high-quality, non-GMO ingredients to ensure purity and taste.","Sustainably sourced ingredients, promoting eco-friendly agricultural practices.","Low in carbohydrates and high in protein, making them a nutritious snack option."]

products.name: Prime Ice pop
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Beverages, Plant-based beverages, Fruit-based beverages, Still fruit soft drinks
products.labels: No gluten, Natural flavors, No caffeine
products.facts: ["Made from natural fruit extracts and ingredients.","Packaging is 100% recyclable and environmentally friendly.","Produced using a low-energy manufacturing process to reduce carbon footprint.","Free from artificial colors and preservatives, ensuring high-quality taste."]

products.name: Granola
products.facts: ["Granola typically contains rolled oats, nuts, seeds, and sweeteners like honey or maple syrup.","Many granola brands use organic ingredients to promote sustainable farming practices.","Granola can be high in fiber and protein, making it a nutritious breakfast or snack option.","Some granolas are made with gluten-free oats, catering to those with gluten sensitivities."]

products.name: Ritz Crackers
products.categories: Snacks,Salty snacks,Sweet snacks,Appetizers,Biscuits and cakes,Biscuits,Crackers,Plain salty snacks,Small Crackers
products.facts: ["Ritz Crackers are primarily made from enriched wheat flour, which includes niacin, reduced iron, thiamine mononitrate, riboflavin, and folic acid.","The packaging of Ritz Crackers is recyclable, promoting better waste management and ecological responsibility.","Ritz Crackers are produced without artificial flavors and colors, ensuring a higher quality snack option.","The brand is committed to sustainability and has initiatives to reduce its carbon footprint during production."]

products.name: Cheerios Serial
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Breakfasts, Cereals and potatoes, Cereals and their products, Breakfast cereals, extruded cereals
products.labels: Kosher, Orthodox Union Kosher, American Heart Certification
products.facts: ["Cheerios are made primarily from whole grain oats, providing a good source of fiber.","The packaging is made from recyclable materials, supporting eco-friendly practices.","Cheerios are gluten-free, made without wheat or barley, making them suitable for those with gluten sensitivities.","The cereal is low in sugar, with only 1 gram of sugar per serving, promoting a healthier breakfast option."]

products.name: Original saltine crackers
products.categories: Snacks, Salty snacks, Sweet snacks, Appetizers, Biscuits and cakes, Biscuits, Crackers
products.facts: ["Original saltine crackers are made primarily from enriched wheat flour, baking soda, and salt.","The packaging for Original saltine crackers is often recyclable, promoting eco-friendliness.","These crackers are low in saturated fat and cholesterol, making them a healthier snack option.","Original saltine crackers have a long shelf life due to their low moisture content, reducing food waste."]

products.name: Large Burrito Flour Tortillas
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Cereals and potatoes, Breads, Flatbreads, White breads, Wheat breads, Wheat flatbreads, Tortillas
products.facts: ["Made from high-quality flour, water, and salt.","Typically packaged in recyclable materials to reduce environmental impact.","Free from artificial preservatives and colors for better quality.","Produced using sustainable farming practices to support ecological balance."]

products.name: Rotini
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Cereals and potatoes, Cereals and their products, Pastas, Dry pastas
products.labels: Kosher, No GMOs, Non GMO project, Orthodox Union Kosher
products.facts: ["Rotini is typically made from durum wheat semolina, which is high in protein and gluten, providing a firm texture when cooked.","Many brands of rotini are produced using non-GMO ingredients, ensuring that no genetically modified organisms are present in the pasta.","Rotini's spiral shape helps to hold onto sauces better, making it a popular choice for pasta salads and hearty dishes.","Some manufacturers offer whole grain or organic rotini options, promoting healthier eating and sustainable farming practices."]

products.name: Choco Bananas minis
products.categories: Snacks, Desserts, Sweet snacks, Cocoa and its products, Confectioneries, Bars, Biscuits and cakes, Chocolate candies, Cakes, Bars covered with chocolate
products.facts: ["Choco Bananas minis are made with real banana pieces coated in high-quality chocolate.","The packaging is designed to be eco-friendly, reducing plastic waste.","Choco Bananas minis are gluten-free and contain no artificial preservatives.","The product is sourced from sustainable banana farms, promoting responsible agriculture."]
